data.lyric:
[ti:Despacito (Remix)]
[ar:Luis Fonsi/Daddy Yankee/Justin Bieber]
[al:Despacito (Remix)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Despacito (Remix) - Luis Fonsi (路易斯·冯西)/Daddy Yankee/Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)
[00:03.28]Written by：Luis Fonsi/Erika Ender/Ramon Ayala/Justin Bieber/Jason "Poo Bear" Boyd
[00:06.56]Producer：Andres Torres/Mauricio Rengifo
[00:09.85]Come and move that in my direction
[00:11.32]
[00:12.36]So thankful for that it's such a blessin' yeah
[00:15.07]Turn every situation into heaven yeah
[00:17.23]
[00:18.30]Oh you are
[00:19.66]
[00:20.82]My sunrise on the darkest day
[00:22.72]
[00:23.49]Got me feelin' some kind of way
[00:25.28]
[00:26.13]Make me wanna savor every moment slowly slowly
[00:28.92]
[00:31.28]You fit me tailor made love how you put it on
[00:33.36]
[00:33.86]Got the only key know how to turn it on
[00:36.38]The way you nibble on my ear the only words I wanna hear
[00:38.69]
[00:39.51]Baby take it slow so we can last long
[00:40.76]Oh tú tú eres el i'mán y yo soy el metal
[00:44.02]
[00:44.71]Me voy acercando y voy armando el plan
[00:47.37]Sólo con pensarlo se acelera el pulso
[00:49.37]
[00:51.27]Oh yeah ya ya me está gustando más de lo normal
[00:54.86]
[00:55.65]Todos mis sentidos van pidiendo más
[00:58.26]Esto hay que tomarlo sin ningún apuro
[01:00.26]
[01:02.05]Despacito
[01:03.29]
[01:04.41]Quiero respirar tu cuello despacito
[01:05.99]
